news.title: Trump's sweeping new tariffs take effect against dozens of countries
news.summary: The president also hits India with a 50% tariff and threatened a 100% levy on foreign-made semiconductors.

news.title: Bank of England expected to cut interest rates
news.summary: Borrowing costs are forecast to fall to 4%, the lowest since early 2023, despite higher inflation.

news.title: Clinics will need licences for Botox and fillers in cosmetics crackdown
news.summary: The government plans to crack down on dodgy cosmetic practitioners in England who exploit people and cause harm.

news.title: Rayner asks China to explain redacted embassy plans
news.summary: The deputy prime minister has requested a response over the blacked-out plans by 20 August.

news.title: Badenoch reveals how she told on exam cheat as teenager
news.summary: The Tory leader speaks about her background and values in an interview with the BBC's Amol Rajan.

news.title: New checks on recycling tyres after BBC reveals millions sent to furnaces in India
news.summary: Campaigners warn the move will not close all the recycling loopholes being exploited by criminals.

news.title: Homelessness minister criticised over rent increase
news.summary: Rushanara Ali MP faces criticism for increasing the rent on a house she owns by hundreds of pounds.

news.title: I have complex PTSD but waiting list means I've only seen psychiatrist once in 10 years
news.summary: Twelve times more mental health patients are waiting more than 18 months for treatment than those with physical health conditions in England, data analysis shows.

news.title: My 30-year-old world record is 'not a good sign for athletics', says Jonathan Edwards
news.summary: Jonathan Edwards' triple jump world record has been standing for 30 years - why hasn't it been broken?

news.title: The Papers: 'Labour's tax war' and 'banter off the menu'
news.summary: Taxes are dominating the papers on Thursday morning, along with edits made to the upcoming series of MasterChef.
